title: Product Features List
description: Animated product features list with checkmark icons and smooth hover effects
longDescription: A modern, animated product features list component with SVG checkmark icons. Features smooth hover animations including background color transitions, text color changes, and icon rotation effects. Fully responsive with customizable colors, sizes, and feature texts. Perfect for highlighting product benefits and key features.

variables.name: hover_bg_color
variables.label: Hover Background Color
variables.description: Background color when hovering over a feature

variables.name: highlight_color
variables.label: Hover Text Color
variables.description: Text color when hovering over a feature

variables.name: icon_size
variables.label: Icon Size (px)
variables.description: Size of the checkmark icons in pixels

variables.name: text_font_size
variables.label: Text Font Size (px)
variables.description: Font size of feature text in pixels

variables.name: feature_2_text
variables.label: Feature 2 Text
variables.defaultValue: Keine eingewachsenen Haare oder Rasierpickel mehr

variables.name: feature_3_text
variables.label: Feature 3 Text
variables.defaultValue: Deutsches Design und einfach zu bedienen
